snippet: Maimuna Abdi Yussuf, a Somali student at African Leadership Academy in Johannesburg, South Africa, is one of eight high school seniors around the world who are blogging about their college searches.
abstract: Maimuna Abdi Yussuf, a Somali student at African Leadership Academy in Johannesburg, South Africa, is one of eight high school seniors around the world who are blogging about their college searches.

headline.main: Launching an American College Search from Africa, By Web and Word of Mouth
